title: Watson Settlement Reaction; 2022 Rebound Candidates
itunes:title: Watson Settlement Reaction; 2022 Rebound Candidates
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, and Gregg Rosenthal start by reacting to the settlement reached between the league and the NFLPA resulting in Deshaun Watson receiving an 11-game suspension and $5M fine. Then, the heroes discuss their favorite rebound candidates for the 2022 season (21:23), including a former MVP quarterback (22:50), a former Pro Bowl tight end (28:31), a coach-quarterback tandem in Florida (33:22), a quarterback who finds himself as a backup at this stage of his career (37:43), a wide receiver on a new team this season (44:40), and the wife of a star player (48:42).

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
